definition: thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)

sentences.english: Tanning beds can also produce high levels of U-V radiation.
sentences.chinese: 日光浴也會產生高強度的紫外線。

sentences.english: Her face was browned. It was clear that was affected by strong ultraviolet rays .
sentences.chinese: 臉是棕色的，顯然是受了強烈紫外線照射的影響。

sentences.english: Objective To study the mechanisms of ultraviolet blood irradiation and oxygenation (UBIO) for psoriasis.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究紫外線照射充氧自血回輸治療銀屑病的機制。

sentences.english: But birds have an extra cone for seeing violet and ultraviolet light.
sentences.chinese: 但是鳥類多了一種錐體，能識別紫色光和紫外線。

sentences.english: Melanin helps the body filter out UV radiation, but it also can be harmful.
sentences.chinese: 黑色素可以幫助身體過濾紫外線，但它也有害處。

sentences.english: Tanning parlors emit UVA rays far more intense ly.
sentences.chinese: 人工美黑儀發出的長波紫外線要強烈得多。

sentences.english: However, in the case of ultraviolet irradiation, the stage of appearance of embryo revealed the highest sensitivity.
sentences.chinese: 對紫外線照射的感受性，則以胚體出現期爲最高。

sentences.english: Water based or solvent free UV curing wetting agent.
sentences.chinese: 水性系統或無溶劑紫外線硬化系統使用之潤溼劑。

sentences.english: The medicine is ultraviolet ray sterilized before grinding.
sentences.chinese: 這種藥經紫外線消毒後研末即可服用。

sentences.english: This colour beyond the violet, invisible to us, is called the ultra- violet.
sentences.chinese: 這種我們看不見的紫色以外的顏色叫紫外線。

sentences.english: All retinoids leave you extra vulnerable to UV damage.
sentences.chinese: 所有維甲酸都使你額外容易地受到紫外線的傷害。

sentences.english: They lie still under an ultra-violet lamp, tempting fate with skin cancer.
sentences.chinese: 他們冒着患皮膚癌的危險，躺在紫外線燈下。

sentences.english: The intensity of near-earth ultraviolet(UV)radiation is increasing with the spoilage of ozone layer.
sentences.chinese: 由於臭氧層損耗，使地球表面的紫外線輻射量增加。

sentences.english: His manager framed a theft against him. saying the undergraduate stole an ultraviolet-proof umbrella.
sentences.chinese: 他的經理誣告說大學生偷了一把防紫外線的雨傘。

sentences.english: the sun's heat and ultraviolet rays will kill anything inside.
sentences.chinese: 陽光的熱度和紫外線會殺死水中的任何有害物。

sentences.english: It enables exact calculation of distance and can perceive ultra-violet and polarized light.
sentences.chinese: 它能夠精確計算距離並且能夠感受紫外線和偏振光。

definition: stratum corneum (outermost layer of the skin)
